aboutUsText1: Our project is a digital platform that collects the multipliity of memory about the history of Ukraine. The project is based on the experience of the project team in interviewing various aspects and events in the history of Ukraine.
aboutUsText2: The topics of the project are different and not limited to this presentation. The oral history method and the biographical method are the basis of the project.  We see our mission in highlighting and presenting the memory of the tragic and extreme events that Ukraine experienced during the Second World War, the Holocaust, the Chernobyl accident, the collapse of the USSR, the annexation of Crimea and Russia's war in eastern Ukraine, the pandemic, and the presentation of the events of Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine.
aboutUsText3: The project involves mapping the sites of memory related to the events of World War II and the Holocaust on the territory of Ukraine, adding oral history testimonies of eyewitnesses, and tracing the fate of people who witnessed World War II in the current circumstances of Russia's full-scale war against Ukraine.
aboutUsText4: The project covers thematic sections and includes special projects that present more focused topics selected for greater detail.  We see a separate component of the project as a dialogue between history and art in the form of graphic histories based on records and visualization of historical sources by contemporary artists.
